page.title: 16RECREATION IN THE HOME
page.content: AT HOME,ALONE,I WOULD TURN 1ST TO MY RECRDS.I LOVE MUSIC ESP U2,DAVID BOWIE & SCRITTI POLITTI,TOM ROBINSON,CRAMPS, AND VARIOS OTHER SINGULAR LP'S & 45'S.I ALSO LIKE JOHN LENNON AND THE BEATLES & JAZZ ,THESE 3 CAN TRANSPORT YOU BACK A COUPLE OF DECADES. ON TV I LIKE FILMS RATHER THAN TV PROGRAMMS.FAV.ACTORS & ACTRESS' INCLUDE AL PACINO,MERYLL STREEP,DUSTIN HOFFMAN & HELEN MIRREN, MARYLIN MONROE,KATHERINE HEPBURN & GRETA GARBO.I LIKE OLD B/W FILMS.IN BOOKS I LIKE AUTHORS LIKE COLLETTE, FRANCIOSE SAGAN,TOLKIEN,EDNA O' BRIEN, JOHN FOWLES & EMMA TENNANT. FAV BOOKS INCL. BRIDESHEAD REBVISITED,CAL & BONJOUR TRISSTESSE.AUTOBIOGRAPHIES ARE ALSO GOOD, I READ MARYLIN MONROE'S,IT WAS VERY GOOD & ALSO THE BEATLES AUTO. THAT WAS BRILLIANT.
